__TOC__

Live in the London, UK area and looking to help Ubuntu? The Canonical design team is looking for volunteers to attend research sessions in London. The design team will be hosting several sessions, but might need different class of users, so this page will document all the sessions so that if you want to participate you can! 

{| class="wikitable"
|-
| Start Date
| End Date
| Target audience
|-
| 22 February
| 5 March
| Technically savvy users, not necessarily sysadmins
|}

The session takes approximately one hour and there will be a cash incentive.

Please email canonical.research@googlemail.com if you can participate and someone from the research agency will get in touch with you.
